entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] The default reconnect display does not appear after an enhanced navigation occurs #51083
  • [Blazor] Interactive server components can't receive Blazor endpoint updates during circuit reconnection #51082
  • BlazorWeb, require button names to have a matching code-behind variable. #51081
  • [Blazor] Interactive root component operations may exceed default SignalR message size #51080
  • [Blazor] Allow an unbounded number of interactive server components to exist in the same page #51075
  • Perf regression: endpoint #51074
  • [Blazor] Guarantee that interactive root component parameter updates originate from the correct source #51073
  • Form post failed to bind to Uri property in Blazor web app #51072
  • Blazor ASP.NET Core Hosted on Azure : error with JwtBearer #51071
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, mvc #51058
  • Cannot use Blazor 8 RC1 wasm on GitHub pages #51057

Closed

  • Upload files to a minimal API endpoint in .NET 8 #50968
  • Quarantine VariableMultipleStreamsInSequence_Success-500-True #43409
    Test failures
  • Flaky test - RouteTableFactoryTests.CanCacheRouteTable #36888
    8.0
  • New blazor wasm hosted project add container orchestrator support debugging doesn't work. #51038
  • NotFound RenderFragment ignore in .Net 8 Blazor Web App? #51044
  • [Blazor] Improvements to how SSR'd components are activated for interactivity #50849
    8.0
  • Minimal API - IFormCollection, IFormFileCollection and IFormFile throw "Invalid anti-forgery token found when reading parameter..." #51052
  • IApplicationBuilder.Map with pathMatch can not find route like it does in .net7 #50984

PullRequests

Created

  • Test-fixed reactions #51079
    area-infrastructure
  • Add DateOnly to Docs #51045 #51078
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Critical fix to output cache; remove OutputCacheEntry recycling #51067
    feature-output-caching, area-networking, area-middleware
  • Rename bootstrap icons that are used in templates #51060
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc, area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] Update SDK #51059
    area-blazor
  • Update AspNetCore.sln #51056
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix typo #51077
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • Update SDK version #51069
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix Blazor WebAssembly PWA empty template #51032
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.0
  • Delete eng/BeforeTargetFrameworkInference.targets #50928
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix failing Kestrel test due to Pings #51034
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Improvements to SSR component activation #50848
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.0
  • Use renamed Extensions package #51070
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [Blazor] Initializers fixes for Blazor Web #50860
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • [Form data mapping] Support for mapping URIs from form data #51019
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • Blazor web csharp template #51030
    area-mvc, area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2281615 #50997
    area-mvc
  • Push history entry after enhanced submit with method=get #51013
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 8.0
  • Add SERVER_NAME variable to IISUrlRewrite #51020
    community-contribution, area-networking
